Keep your data
safe from harm

ElkarBackup will help you securing your company data
Manage all your backups from a single place, with an easy-to-use web interface!

Find Out More

We've got what you need!

Are you a system administrator? We know that being in charge of backup strategies for your company is a big responsibility. Fortunately, stumble upon the right software makes our life easier!

ElkarBackup is a free open-source software and it's based in other open source technologies as RSnapshot, Rsync, PHP and Symfony.

Get Started!

Features

Easy-to-use UI

Manage your backups trough its web interface

Instant recovery

Just choose the date, the time... and restore!

Secure

Files are transfered using SSH and Rsync

Scriptable

What do you want to do before or after the backup job?

Multilanguage

Currently english, spanish and basque supported

Notifications

Be informed when something goes wrong

Logs

We consider logs specially critical on a backup software

Multiuser

Users with limited permissions (work in progress)
